text: Luca Sartori (born 19 July 1971) is an Italian rower. He competed in the men's coxless four event at the 1992 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Italian male rowers Category:Olympic rowers of Italy Category:Rowers at the 1992 Summer Olympics Category:People from Terracina
title: Luca Sartori
